heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_morphling
heroes.bio_loc: For dark eons the comet circled. Held in thrall to a distant sun, bound by gravity's inexorable pull, the massive ball of ice careened through the blackness between worlds, made strange by its dark journey. On the eve of the ancient war of the Vloy, it punched down through the sky and lit a glowing trail across the night, a sign both armies took for an omen. The frozen ball melted in a flash of boiling heat, as below two forces enjoined in battle across the border of a narrow river. Thus freed from its icy stasis, the Morphling was born into conflict, an elemental power at one with the tides of the ocean, capricious and unconstrained. He entered the fight, instinctively taking the form of the first general who dared set foot across the water, and then struck him dead. As the motley warriors clashed, he shifted from form to form throughout the battle, instantly absorbing the ways of these strange creatures--now a footsoldier, now an archer, now the cavalryman--until, by the time the last soldier fell, Morphling had played every part. The battle's end was his beginning.
heroes.hype_loc: Shifting his attributes to suit his situation, Morphling can be as elusive as he is deadly. Whether riding a wave to flank an enemy, or boosting his health before escaping into his deceptive replication, few can hope to corner him.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Rides the waves to flank enemies

facets.description_loc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now <font color='#9acd32'>Agility</font>. Waveform attacks enemies in his path.
facets.name: morphling_agi

facets.description_loc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now <font color='#ff0000'>Strength</font>. Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's strength. Morphling gains %one_percent_tooltip%%% Spell Amp per %agi_per_one_spell_amp% Agility.
facets.name: morphling_str

abilities.name: morphling_waveform
abilities.desc_loc: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
abilities.lore_loc: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
facets_loc: Waveform attacks enemies in his path. Does not apply on-hit effects.

abilities.name: morphling_adaptive_strike_agi
abilities.desc_loc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used.

The target is also knocked back based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum knockback distance is used.
abilities.lore_loc: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
facets_loc: Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's strength.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_agi
abilities.desc_loc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
abilities.lore_loc: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
notes_loc: Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.
abilities.shard_loc: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned. Reduces mana cost.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_str
abilities.desc_loc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
abilities.lore_loc: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
notes_loc: Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.
abilities.shard_loc: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned. Reduces mana cost.

abilities.name: morphling_replicate
abilities.desc_loc: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
abilities.lore_loc: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
notes_loc: You can't target yourself with Morph.
Morph won't copy Shard/Scepter abilities unless Morphling owns the respective item.
abilities.scepter_loc: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.

abilities.name: morphling_accumulation
abilities.desc_loc: Morphling receives %percent_to_increment%%% of stat growth bonuses every half level instead of the full bonus at level up. All Attributes bonuses from skill points in the Talent Tree provide an additional +%bonus_primary_stat_per_level_of_attributes% to Morphling's primary attribute.

abilities.name: morphling_ebb
abilities.desc_loc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now <font color='#9acd32'>Agility</font>.

abilities.name: morphling_flow
abilities.desc_loc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now <font color='#ff0000'>Strength</font>. Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's strength. Morphling gains %one_percent_tooltip%%% Spell Amp per %agi_per_one_spell_amp% Agility.
notes_loc: Break disables the Spell Amp per Agility.
